    • Constructor Detail

      • Lunge

        public Lunge(java.lang.String playerAddress,
             double dir,
             Brute attacker,
             int x,
             int y,
             StatusEffect status,
             double duration,
             double stopMoving,
             long time)
        Creates an Attack that moves in front of a Brute
        Parameters:
        playerAddress - The player's IP address
        dir - The direction of the lunge
        attacker - The Brute that started this lunge
        x - X-position
        y - Y-position
        status - Status effect this causes
        duration - The duration of the attack
        stopMoving - When to stop moving
        time - Server time of instantiation
